template.name: Display Notification
template.description: Create an Activity to display inside a custom display notification and a BroadcastReceiver to post it

parameter.name: Display Activity Class
parameter.help: The name of the Activity that will be displayed for the notification

parameter.name: Display Activity Layout Name
parameter.help: The layout name for the Activity that will be displayed for the notification

parameter.name: Receiver Class
parameter.help: The name of the BroadcastReceiver that will post the notification

parameter.name: Launcher Stub Class
parameter.help: The name of the Stub Activity that sends the broadcast for testing purposes

parameter.name: Exported
parameter.help: Whether or not the broadcast receiver can receive messages from sources outside its application
